description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6gi0p","text":"This protocol has been successfully used with Botrylloides diegensis and has been based on the following publication (with small changes): ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":46,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a70bd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc2mb","text":"https://febs.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/pdf/10.1016/0014-5793(89)80446-6","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":73}],"data":{}},{"key":"3mq2j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D10C0CD790C011EC84BC0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://febs.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/pdf/10.1016/0014-5793(89)80446-6"}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"fs42c","text":"from step 8 on, avoid vortexing or vigorous shaking; invert the tube gently to avoid breaking the DNA.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"5n9d7","text":"TE Buffer: 100 mM Tris-borate, pH 8.0 + 50 mM Na2EDTA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":48,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2np8h","text":"14 % (w/v) SDS (sodium dodecyl sulfate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9phtc","text":"10 mg/mL RNase","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cg84","text":"20 mg/mL Proteinase K","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbfg0","text":"Phenol pH 8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36b4l","text":"Chloroform","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"befp4","text":"1:1 (v/v) Phenol pH 8.0/Chloroform","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26bsr","text":"Cold ethanol (-20 °C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mp3b","text":"3M sodium acetate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3q20b","text":"RNase-free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cap","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ei02","text":"2mL tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fq2r","text":"sterile plastic pestle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nv58","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckuhg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
